feed.title: GitHub AppleScript Daily Trending

entry.title: milligramme/prepare_dotjs_chrome
entry.summary:
setup script for dotjs+chrome

Ummmmm

description

dotjs + chrome setup script

require

  • defunkt/dotjs Â· GitHub
  • cliclick v2 or later

usage

  • run prepare_dotjs_chrome.app (compile prepare_dotjs_chrome.applescript)

  • run with shellscript

      $ osascript /path/to/prepare_dotjs_chrome.applescipt
  or 
  $ sh prepare_dotjs.sh

  • set prepare_dotjs_chrome.app to login item for auto setup
